name: Get out of Bed (Abso)
description:
Sorry if the game is created to a mediocre standard, I have only started learning how to create games on unity. So far it has been 2 months since I started learning how to code in C# and I love it.

Hopefully you guys get some enjoyment from trying to win and would always love any coding tips and easy tutorials on how to improve as a game designer :D.

All the assets were also created by me and i'm proud that 90% of the game is created with my own coding ability  and designing ability... the other being the non copyright background music XD

Programs Used:

- Aseprite

- Unity 2D

- Photoshop
